description:
"Discover How To Set Up Your Own Membership Site…"

Although I offer more advanced trainings on the ins and outs of adding and maintaining a successful and profitable membership or group program to your business, I designed this training specifically for students who want are motivated to take action and get started out testing your ideas as quickly as possible...

If you are:

  • Tired of relying solely on a job that gives you a paycheck that barely allows you to make ends meet each month
  • Frustrated and burned out by trading "dollars for hours" in your existing business and want to start making more money while doing less work
  • Excited about the idea of earning money while you're on vacation or sleeping soundly in your bed
  • Ready to help a much larger audience and make a big impact in the world

…Then starting your own Membership Site or group program might be just the solution for you.

My name is Kim Nishida and I've been helping my clients plan, design, and create membership sites and group programs since 2007 so that they can earn hundreds of thousands of dollars without being a slave to their day job or business.

But earning tons of money with your own Membership Site is NOT for everyone…

Why? Because there are so many ways to screw it up!

And one of the fastest paths to failure is actually Over-Thinking it and taking forever to launch your site.

That's why I created, "The Quick & Easy Way to Profit From Membership Sites..."

In this course, you will discover:

  • Why Membership Sites Are So Profitable
  • The 3 Essential Questions That Can Get (Or Lose) You Members
  • 3 Quick Solutions for Building Your Site From Scratch (2 of Them Are Free)
  • 3 Must Have Components For Making Money
  • 3 Traffic Sources That Lead to More Members
  • A Cheat Sheet That Shows You Everything You Need At-A-Glance
  • A BONUS VIDEO: How to Set Up Your Own Private Group On Facebook So You Can Get Started As Quickly As Possible
  • Advanced Step-By-Step tutorials on how to get started with your own web hosting account
  • And much more
title: The Quick & Easy Way To Profit From Membership Sites
